ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In This Complete Full Set Package.
4 x GW37HD: 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Bullet Camera, 850 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24PCS Infrared LED, 49 feet IR Distance. 0.1 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof;
8 x GW560HD: 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Dome Camera, 850 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 30PCS Infrared LED, 65 feet IR Distance. 0.1 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination.
16 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 4 CH WD1 +12 CH WCIF Recroding +16 CH playback. iPhone/Android Viewable
FREE 1 Year Warranty and FREE Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
